Header: Fuel Stations instructed to issue ful at previous rates
Content: The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation has instructed fuel stations to issue fuel based on the previous prices and to disregard the price hike announced from midnight yesterday. The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation said that there are sufficient stocks of fuel at all filling stations in the island. The Corporation has called on the people to lodge complaints immediately if there are filling stations that reject the issue of fuel to consumers. The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation said that action has been taken for the distribution of sufficient fuel stock without any issue. The Corporation said that filling stations have been apprised of issuing fuel stocks to consumers. Any filling station rejecting the issue of fuel can be immediately complained on contact number 0115 455 130. The Petroleum Corporation said that this contact number is operative round the clock.
